showerReviews.reviewText: It's a place to park your camper at a monthly rate. They have electricity hook up and a shower house with a washer and dryer

I like it here bathrooms are very nice I have a camper here the owners are very nice folks it's been very nice,if you are just passing through or going to be here a while this is the best you can get in my opinion

I have a question for the owner.  Why don't you clean the place up?  All of these comments say the same thing. You'd probably get a lot more business. You could buy a couple goats and chickens, maybe a donkey for next to nothing.  Apparently people want to see animals when the go camping.  You'd probably become a millionaire.

An older looking park with more than half appearing to be full timers and some looking really poorly cared for. Showers were fine, but locating spots a little difficult. Good size truck stop across the street for a few things you may need as well.

locations.content: Genesis Health Clubs - Ballpark Village may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Joining this gym was one of the best decisions I made to start my wellness and fitness journey. Always clean, staff is always pleasant and the floor plan is spacious. Even during peak hours, there's still room to move around without feeling  cramped. Local gyms can't compete with Genesis!!! Top tier experience!

Love this gym! It has big, floor-to-ceiling windows that bring so much natural light into the space! It always puts me in a good mood to be in a clean and refreshing environment when I work out, and Genesis is exactly that! Group classes, …
Gym-goers want few things from a gym: plenty of space, plenty of equipment, and plenty of cleanliness. Genesis checks those boxes. …

Great gym and the best personal training experiences around! It’s very well kept, clean, spacious, and has the best staff. It’s in a prime location and has a great view when the Cardinals are playing.
Excellent gym in a great location! Very clean. Tons of well maintained equipment, very spacious, and friendly and helpful staff.

showerReviews.reviewText: This hotel was everything we needed-close to Busch Stadium and in the heart of Ballpark Village. The hotel was clean and reasonably priced with excellent service and welcoming staff. The room was spacious and comfortable. It is a 10 minute walk to the Gateway Arch. We would definitely stay here again.

Excellent experience.  The room was very clean and functional.  The restaurant had a great breakfast.  Parking was convenient.  Staff was helpful.  It was the best hotel experience I’ve had in the USA in years.  For sure the best in St. Louis!

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a GREAT place to stay!  The location is terrific and easy to get to anywhere.  We arrived early and were able to get into our room right away.  The rooms are a little small, but it is an older building, and the bathroom is a good …

Outstanding experience.  We felt welcome and appreciated as soon as we arrived.  I believe place was full, but service was superb.  We felt like the only guests.  Room was clean.  Front desk answered all our questions and thanked us for …

This is a great hotel,  very centrally located to everything.
The staff were attentive and friendly and the quality of the food was good.
The area around the hotel was clean and felt quite safe.

Definitely recommend! Staff were very friendly! Special shout out to kitchen staff,  the breakfast and 5:30 kickback food was always stocked and kept clean. Loved that Union station was across the street,  perfect for my 3 year old grandson!
